experience.description: Mergers & Acquisitions Sell-side and Buy-side, Private Equity, Debt Advisory and International Business Development Advisory in various geographies and industries.‚ë† Deal Origination and Execution: ‚ñ™Originated, negotiated, and executed corporate finance transactions, including buy-side target acquisition mandates, sell-side mandates, and strategic joint ventures in Europe and the GCC.  ‚ñ™Advised clients on raising debt and equity from institutional investors, private credit, and private equity funds to fuel their strategic growth plans and refinance existing assets.  ‚ë° Business Development: ‚ñ™Led the expansion of the firm by growing its network of corporate and institutional clients and partners, fostering strategic partnerships for mutual growth. ‚ñ™Developed an extensive client network focused on the GCC and Europe, spanning corporates, financial institutions, and institutional investors.  ‚ñ™Facilitated access for European corporations and institutions to GCC private and government sector stakeholders. ‚ë¢ Leadership and Team Management: ‚ñ™Directed internal deal execution teams, and managed and supported external M&A execution teams of clients including their external counsel, in the preparation of transaction materials and documentation.‚ë£Sector and Geographical Coverage: ‚ñ™Covered various geographic regions, including the UK, Poland, Italy, United Arab Emirates, and Saudi Arabia under the broader European and Gulf Cooperation Council areas. ‚ñ™Focused sectors include Healthcare, Logistics, Real Estate, eCommerce and Renewable Energy.
